caption: Respond to a property possession claim
heading: Tenancy, occupation contract or licence agreement
insetText: When they made their claim, Treetops Housing had to give details about the type of tenancy, occupation contract or licence agreement you signed to rent your property, and the date it began, if known.
tenancyType: The property is let under an assured tenancy agreement
legend: Is the tenancy, occupation contract or licence agreement type correct?
correctTypeLabel: Give the correct tenancy, occupation contract or licence type

errors.tenancyTypeConfirm: Select if these tenancy, licence or occupation contract details are correct
errors.tenancyDetails.correctType: Enter the correct tenancy, occupation contract or licence type
errors.requiredText: Enter the correct tenancy, licence or occupation contract details
errors.defaultMaxLength: Tenancy, occupation contract or licence type must be 60 characters or less
